translation.en: ♪ Ain't that love, baby That I feel in my heart for you ♪
translation.zh: 片名：认贼作爸妈

translation.en: ♪ Here comes the bride ♪
translation.zh: 新娘到来

translation.en: ♪ All dressed in-- ♪ Stair!
translation.zh: 一身… 小心楼梯

translation.en: ♪ White ♪
translation.zh: …雪白

translation.en: ♪ Follow the sound of my voice Right here ♪ ♪ Stop right there! ♪
translation.zh: 跟着我的声音来 这边 停下

translation.en: Okay, open your eyes.
translation.zh: 好了 睁开眼睛

translation.en: It's a 3D seating chart. -Built to scale, naturally. -Wow!
translation.zh: 三维座位图 当然是按比例制作

translation.en: Each action figure corresponds to the personality and/or appearance of our guest.
translation.zh: 每一个可动人偶 都与我们客人的个性及或样貌对应

translation.en: -Babe, this is incredible! -You like it?
translation.zh: -宝贝 太厉害了 -你喜欢吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I like it. I love it. -Mmm.
translation.zh: 喜欢啊 特别喜欢！

translation.en: Who's He-Man?
translation.zh: 谁是希曼？

translation.en: What do you mean, "Who's He-Man?"
translation.zh: 这还不明显吗？

translation.en: Look at his butt cheeks, then look at mine.
translation.zh: 看看他的屁股 再看看我的屁股

translation.en: -Tell me it's not the same. -Mmm-hmm. Yep, I see it now.
translation.zh: -难道不是一个模子刻里出来的？ -嗯 现在看明白了

translation.en: All right! So what do we think? Bride gets final say.
translation.zh: 好的 怎么样？ 最终决定权在新娘手里

translation.en: -[woman] Those are your parents, right? -Mmm-hmm.
translation.zh: -这两位是你父母 对吧？ -嗯

translation.en: Do you think we could add two more to that table?
translation.zh: 你觉得这桌上能不能加两个人？

translation.en: My parents just emailed that they're coming.
translation.zh: 我父母刚给我发电子邮件说会来

translation.en: -Are you kidding? What? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -真的吗？他们要来？ -嗯

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God, Parker.
translation.zh: 天呐！帕克尔

translation.en: Yes! Oh, I get to meet your parents, finally!
translation.zh: 太好了！我终于能见到你父母了！

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Parker] Oh, okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I'm gonna marry this guy.
translation.zh: 我要嫁给这人

translation.en: Oh, gosh, that is-- Oh, you have to be so psyched.
translation.zh: 天呐！你一定很激动

translation.en: Are you psyched? You're not psyched. Are you psyched at all?
translation.zh: 你激动吗？你不激动 完全不激动？

translation.en: -Is there any psyched happening? -Yeah. Yeah, no, I…
translation.zh: -有什么情况吗？ -嗯 不是 我…

translation.en: It's… It's totally great. I just…
translation.zh: 非常好 我…

translation.en: I've told you. They can be… They can be a lot.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过的 他们有时候很难对付

translation.en: Okay, have you met my parents?
translation.zh: 好吧 你见过我父母吗？

translation.en: I only picked Skeletor and Medusa
translation.zh: 我选了骷髅王和美杜莎代表他们

translation.en: because they don't make Stalin and Lizzie Borden dolls.
translation.zh: 只不过是因为没有 斯大林和丽兹·波顿的人偶

translation.en: Yeah, I'd probably regret it one day if my parents didn't come to my wedding.
translation.zh: 嗯 如果我父母不来 我大概会感到遗憾

translation.en: Yes, you would. We're gonna get through this.
translation.zh: 没错 我们会挺过去的

translation.en: 'Cause there is nothing He-Man and the pink Power Ranger can't handle together.
translation.zh: 希曼和粉红恐龙战士联手天下无敌

translation.en: Unless Hordak shows up at the wedding.
translation.zh: 就怕霍达克在婚礼上出现

translation.en: Is that a deep cut He-Man reference?
translation.zh: 是《希曼》里的深度情节吗？

translation.en: Yeah-ha!
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Oh, I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: Oh, I love you too.
translation.zh: 我也爱你

translation.en: [Owen's mother on speakerphone] Your Aunt Linda, she's allergic to nickel.
translation.zh: 你琳达阿姨对镍过敏

translation.en: Does the silverware have nickel?
translation.zh: 银餐具里含镍吗？

translation.en: I don't know, Mom.
translation.zh: 我不知道 妈

translation.en: Cheap silverware has nickel. Nickel-plated, okay?
translation.zh: 便宜的银餐具是镀镍的

translation.en: You're not gonna skimp on the silverware?
translation.zh: 你要在餐具上省钱吗？

translation.en: I'll make sure we have high-quality, nickel-free silverware.
translation.zh: 我一定安排使用高品质无镍银餐具

translation.en: -Okay? -Good.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -那就好

translation.en: But that's not why I called. I've got good news.
translation.zh: 不过我打来不是为了这个 我有好消息

translation.en: Parker's parents can come to the wedding.
translation.zh: 帕克尔的父母能来参加婚礼

translation.en: Hello? Guys, I know you're there, I can hear Dad's nose whistle.
translation.zh: 喂？哎 我知道你们在听 我能听到爸的鼻哨声

translation.en: I'm sorry, what kinda parents skip their own daughter's wedding?
translation.zh: 不好意思 什么样的父母会不去自己女儿婚礼？

translation.en: They're not skipping it! That's the thing, they're not!
translation.zh: 他们没有不去！不是说了要来吗？

translation.en: Oh, please.
translation.zh: 省省吧

translation.en: I'm sorry, they were living with the Yanomami tribe in the Amazon.
translation.zh: 他们之前在亚马逊丛林 和亚诺马米部落一起生活

translation.en: It's not exactly easy for them to travel.
translation.zh: 要过来可不方便

translation.en: No wonder Parker became a stripper.
translation.zh: 难怪帕克尔当了脱衣舞女

translation.en: She's not a stripper! I've told you a million times!
translation.zh: 她不是脱衣舞女 我跟你说了无数遍！

translation.en: She runs a yoga studio! A very successful one!
translation.zh: 她开的是瑜伽工作室 而且生意很好

translation.en: Oh, I didn't know that.
translation.zh: 这我倒不知道嘛

translation.en: Yes, you knew that! I invited you to a class.
translation.zh: 你知道！我之前邀请你去上课

translation.en: You expect your mother to get on a pole?
translation.zh: 你要你妈去爬钢管？

translation.en: -There's no pole! It's a yoga studio! -I'll bet business is booming.
translation.zh: 没有钢管！怎么会有钢管呢？ 是瑜伽工作室 -生意肯定蒸蒸日上 -没错 不过不是你想的那种

translation.en: It is booming. Not in the way I think you're inferring.
translation.zh: -生意肯定蒸蒸日上 -没错 不过不是你想的那种

translation.en: -I'm just saying. -Please.
translation.zh: -我就是这么一说 -拜托

translation.en: Please, can we just not make it weird? Just this one time?
translation.zh: 能不能别这么奇怪？就这一次

translation.en: -[parents] Weird? -We're not weird! You're weird!
translation.zh: -奇怪？ -奇怪？我们不奇怪 你才奇怪

translation.en: Your father and I have been talking about it recently.
translation.zh: 我和你爸最近在聊这个问题

translation.en: You've become weird, Owen.
translation.zh: 你现在变得很奇怪 欧文

translation.en: It's true!
translation.zh: 没错！

translation.en: [Owen's mother] And you never behaved like that before you met this stripper!
translation.zh: 在遇见这个脱衣舞女之前 你从来不这样！

translation.en: ♪ Light the blunts up When I walk in the building ♪
translation.zh: （阳山联合银行） （预留车位 欧文·布朗宁 银行经理）

translation.en: ♪ Gravy gettin' buck Every time I get up in it ♪
translation.zh: （预留车位 欧文·布朗宁 银行经理）

translation.en: ♪ Always pull up With a plethora of women ♪
translation.zh: （欧文·布朗宁 银行经理）

translation.en: ♪ Mama say, "What's up?" She trying to get it ♪
translation.zh: （欧文·布朗宁 银行经理）

translation.en: -Boop. -[song fading]
translation.zh: 啵

translation.en: Let me get this straight. You haven't met this woman's parents yet?
translation.zh: 我再问一下 你还没见过她父母？

translation.en: No. It's not that weird.
translation.zh: 没有 也不是太奇怪嘛

translation.en: They've been off the grid the whole time we've been together.
translation.zh: 我们在一起期间 他们一直不在

translation.en: That's so fucking weird, man.
translation.zh: 太他妈奇怪了 兄弟

translation.en: Owen, I don't wanna hurt your feelings,
translation.zh: 欧文 你别感到受伤啊

translation.en: but when you first told us about Parker, we thought you were makin' her up.
translation.zh: 不过当你跟我们说帕克尔的时候 我们还以为你瞎编的

translation.en: That does hurt my feelings.
translation.zh: 我很受伤

translation.en: But it shouldn't hurt your feelings, because I've never seen you with nobody,
translation.zh: 不过你不应该感到受伤 因为我从来没见过你和谁在一起

translation.en: so I'm like, "This can't be a real woman. Maybe it's a mannequin or a sex doll."
translation.zh: 我当时想：“不可能是真人 可能是人体模型或者性爱玩偶”

translation.en: But guess what? She was real.
translation.zh: 不过你猜怎么着？她是真人

translation.en: When I saw her, I was like, "Girl, you alive!"
translation.zh: 看见她时 我心想：“你是大活人啊！”

translation.en: This motherfucker made this fairy tale come true.
translation.zh: 这王八蛋把童话变成了现实

translation.en: Because I didn't believe shit you said at first.
translation.zh: 我一开始根本不相信你说的

translation.en: This couldn't be hurting my feelings any more.
translation.zh: 受伤到极点

translation.en: What we're saying is, is that whatever spell or potion you used
translation.zh: 我们的意思是 不管你给她灌了什么迷魂汤 让她喜欢上了你

translation.en: to trick that woman into liking you isn't gonna work on her parents.
translation.zh: 不管你给她灌了什么迷魂汤 让她喜欢上了你 对她父母肯定没用

translation.en: -Oh, you're worried about me with parents? -[tube dinging]
translation.zh: 你担心我搞不定她父母？

translation.en: The only people that love me more than parents? Grandparents.
translation.zh: 长辈特别喜欢我 爷爷奶奶们更是如此

translation.en: You sit me next to a grandma at dinner, watch the sparks fly.
translation.zh: 晚餐时把我安排在老奶奶旁边 我能让她笑出花来

translation.en: Oh, this is the diaper! She did it again! -Hey! Hey! Just-- -[baby crying]
translation.zh: 噢 这是尿不湿 她又这样 哎！

translation.en: Uh, why am I even doing this? This isn't my job. This is Gary's job.
translation.zh: 我干嘛做这个？ 这不是我的工作 这是盖瑞的工作

translation.en: Guys, where's Gary?
translation.zh: 哎 盖瑞去哪儿了？

translation.en: All right, no more "accidentally" locking Gary in the vault. I'm serious.
translation.zh: 好吧 不准再“不小心”把盖瑞锁在金库里 我说真的

translation.en: It's this new security system you designed.
translation.zh: 是因为你设计的新保安系统

translation.en: -Shit is mad complicated. -It should be. It's a vault.
translation.zh: 这东西特别复杂 应该复杂 这是金库

translation.en: It's state-of-the-art. No one's getting in this bad boy.
translation.zh: 这是最先进的 谁都进不去

translation.en: Oh! Is this the same one Phoebe King has?
translation.zh: 这和菲比·金的一样吗？

translation.en: -Essentially. -[woman] Who is Phoebe King?
translation.zh: -大致相同 -菲比·金是谁？

translation.en: Phoebe King manages Atlas Reserve, the top bank in the state.
translation.zh: 菲比·金是阿特拉斯储备银行的经理 那可是全州最好的银行

translation.en: Not a top bank. Mmm-mmm. There's not, like, an official ranking or anything.
translation.zh: 不是最好的银行 并没有正式排名

translation.en: 100% is, they wrote a whole article. Yeah, that's the top bank in the state.
translation.zh: 肯定是 有一整篇文章介绍 就是全州最好的银行

translation.en: It's a good bank, decent bank. Clean.
translation.zh: 确实是好银行 很干净

translation.en: Last conference, Owen got called out by Phoebe King,
translation.zh: 上一次大会 菲比·金对欧文叫嚣

translation.en: by her saying that a Butterball turkey could break into our vault.
translation.zh: 说一只烤熟的火鸡 也能闯进我们的金库

translation.en: I don't exactly remember it like that.
translation.zh: 我倒不记得了嘛

translation.en: And she called you a dickless troll. -Oh! -Damn!
translation.zh: 她还说你是没鸡鸡的喷子 妈的！

translation.en: Now, I tried not to laugh, but I couldn't help it 'cause it was fucking hysterical.
translation.zh: 我当时想忍住不笑 但是没办法 因为实在太好笑了

translation.en: -Imagining you without a dick. -Ooh!
translation.zh: 想象一下没有鸡鸡的你

translation.en: Just nothing but a smooth surface, no genitalia at all.
translation.zh: 平平的 什么都没有 没有生殖器

translation.en: Dickless troll, that's borderline unprofessional.
translation.zh: 没鸡鸡的喷子 这样说话太不专业了

translation.en: Fucking hilarious.
translation.zh: 太他妈好笑了

translation.en: And you know what? I'd love to see a Butterball turkey break into this.
translation.zh: 我倒想看看烤熟的火鸡闯进去

translation.en: ♪ She left me roses by the stairs ♪
translation.zh: 她在楼梯旁留了玫瑰给我

translation.en: Hey, Gary.
translation.zh: 你好 盖瑞

translation.en: You're lucky I had mints in my pocket. I could have starved in here.
translation.zh: 算你走运 我口袋里有薄荷糖 要不可能饿死在这里面

translation.en: For probably the 50th time,
translation.zh: 这大概是第50次了

translation.en: there's an emergency escape latch on the inside of the door.
translation.zh: 门里有紧急逃生开关

translation.en: Every vault has one.
translation.zh: 每个金库都有

translation.en: And like I keep telling you…
translation.zh: 我跟你说过很多次了

translation.en: [yelling] I can't find it!
translation.zh: 我找不到！

translation.en: [man whispers] God damn, Gary.
translation.zh: 真是的 盖瑞

translation.en: [Owen's mother] So, um, Parker,
translation.zh: 对了 帕克尔

translation.en: um, I understand that your parents are doing the right thing
translation.zh: 听说你父母终于想通了

translation.en: and coming to your wedding.
translation.zh: 会来参加你们的婚礼

translation.en: Isn't that nice? It's very nice!
translation.zh: 真是太好了

translation.en: -[Owen] Yes, it is! Thanks, Mom. -[Parker] Yeah. Super nice.
translation.zh: -对 谢谢妈妈 -太好了

translation.en: [whispers] She hasn't seen her parents for a very long time.
translation.zh: 她很久没和父母见面了

translation.en: I know. I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: -How come they're not showing up? -They live in a cave in the jungle.
translation.zh: -为什么见不着他们？ -他们住在丛林的洞穴里

translation.en: -Like Bin Laden? -A little like Bin Laden, right.
translation.zh: -本·拉登那样？ -对 像本·拉登那样生活

translation.en: -[Owen] Um, that's… That's not it. -It's okay, I got it.
translation.zh: -呃 不是这样的 -没事

translation.en: -Can I see your tattoos again? -Oh, um, not right now.
translation.zh: -我明白 -我能再看一下你的纹身吗？ 现在不看了吧 你玛吉阿姨不太喜欢

translation.en: Your Aunt Margie isn't the biggest fan, so, shh.
translation.zh: 现在不看了吧 你玛吉阿姨不太喜欢

translation.en: She said you got them so you could get bigger tips when you strip.
translation.zh: 她说你脱衣服的时候会拿到更多小费

translation.en: -Uh, once again, I'm not a stripper. -My boyfriend's gonna get a tattoo.
translation.zh: -再说一次 我不是脱衣舞女 -我男朋友要纹纹身

translation.en: -[Parker] Oh, yeah? Of what? -My name across his lower back.
translation.zh: -是嘛？纹什么？ -在他腰上纹我的名字

translation.en: -[exclaims] -Hey, cuz!
translation.zh: 赞 -哎 老表！ -吓死我了！你好 兄弟

translation.en: Jesus! Hi, buddy. Well, don't…
translation.zh: -哎 老表！ -吓死我了！你好 兄弟 别这样

translation.en: How come I wasn't invited to the, uh, bachelor party?
translation.zh: 怎么没邀请我参加你的单身派对？

translation.en: -You know I'm, like, an EMT now, right? -[mutters] I do know that, yeah.
translation.zh: -你也知道我现在当急救员了 对吧？ -嗯 我知道

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'd love to give you a ride in the ambulance.
translation.zh: 我可以带你坐救护车

translation.en: -You know, hit the siren, zip around town. -[Owen's father] That's fun.
translation.zh: -打开警报器 到处横冲直撞 -很有意思啊

translation.en: Yeah, maybe, uh, flatline you in the back, go to the other side.
translation.zh: 也可以让你躺在后面 体验一下上西天的感觉

translation.en: Ask Grandpa Seymour what it was like dying by, you know…
translation.zh: 去问一下西摩外公 这样死的时候是什么感觉

translation.en: [Owen's father] Okay, stop it. All right.
translation.zh: -好吧 你干嘛这样？ -停吧 好了

translation.en: -[Owen] Why is he doing that? -[Owen's father] That was a rumor. Stop.
translation.zh: -他干嘛这样？ -这是传言 停吧

translation.en: No, man. She walked in on it. She was so sad when she found him.
translation.zh: 被她撞个正着 看见他的时候 她非常难过

translation.en: Guy's a legend, died beating off.
translation.zh: 他真是传奇人物 打飞机打死

translation.en: I'm getting a phone call. Lucky for me. I didn't even plan this.
translation.zh: 有人打电话给我 我太幸运了 都不是我有意安排的

translation.en: This just happened coincidentally. Hey, storage space!
translation.zh: 刚好碰巧 仓库租赁！

translation.en: Ah, thanks for returning my call!
translation.zh: 谢谢给我回电话

translation.en: -This is Owen Browning again. -What the fuck do you want?
translation.zh: -又是我 欧文·布朗宁 -你他妈有什么事？

translation.en: Well, I'm getting married in a week,
translation.zh: 我一周后结婚

translation.en: so I'm putting together a little photo montage.
translation.zh: 所以要合成点照片

translation.en: But here's the thing, I don't have any photos of my fiancée's family.
translation.zh: 不过有一个问题 我没有我未婚妻家人的照片

translation.en: And rumor has it that they actually have a unit in your storage facility.
translation.zh: 据说他们在你的仓库有一个储物柜

translation.en: Um, it should be under the name McDermott.
translation.zh: 用的名字应该是麦克德莫特

translation.en: -[sinister note plays] -Do… Do you have the locker?
translation.zh: 有吗？

translation.en: -[Owen's mother] Oh, my God! -[Owen's father] I'm on fire!
translation.zh: -天呐！ -我着火了！

translation.en: -[man] EMT! -Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 急救员！ 哎呀！

translation.en: -[all clamoring] -[man] Soy sauce!
translation.zh: -灭火！不要！ -酱油！

translation.en: Mom! That's not water!
translation.zh: 妈！那不是水！

translation.en: Yeah. You told me to call if anyone asked about the McDermott locker.
translation.zh: 你之前说 有人问麦克德莫特租的储物柜 就给你打电话

translation.en: [woman] McDermott locker?
translation.zh: 麦克德莫特的储物柜？

translation.en: Yes. Do you have a name?
translation.zh: 对 谁在问？

translation.en: Owen Browning.
translation.zh: 欧文·布朗宁

translation.en: These diamonds are shit.
translation.zh: 这些钻石是垃圾

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: It's silly. I thought that…
translation.zh: 我胡思乱想 还以为这按钮是机关

translation.en: [laughs] I thought that button was a trap door to a shark tank or something.
translation.zh: 我胡思乱想 还以为这按钮是机关 会打开鲨鱼池的暗门什么的

translation.en: [laughs] Trap door? No!
translation.zh: 暗门？不是

translation.en: I just wanted someone to come clean up this mess.
translation.zh: 我只是要人来收拾一下这烂摊子

translation.en: -What mess? -You.
translation.zh: -什么烂摊子？ -你

translation.en: [softly] "Shark tank."
translation.zh: 鲨鱼池

translation.en: Call the aquarium!
translation.zh: 给水族馆打电话！

translation.en: Does your dad always keep an extra shirt in the trunk of his car?
translation.zh: 你爸总在汽车后备箱备一件衬衫？

translation.en: [Owen] Ha! Yeah, well… It's not the first time he caught on fire in a restaurant.
translation.zh: 这不是他头一次在餐厅着火

translation.en: And then how about when your niece asked me
translation.zh: 你外甥女还问我

translation.en: if my neck flaps in the wind when I ride a bicycle?
translation.zh: 我骑自行车的时候 脖子会不会在风中摇曳

translation.en: Thank you for not being offended.
translation.zh: 谢谢你不生气

translation.en: They are truly disturbed people.
translation.zh: 他们真的心理不正常

translation.en: Yuck.
translation.zh: 好恶心

translation.en: Jesus, there you are. Oh, you smell like my stepdad's car.
translation.zh: 哎呀 你在这里 你闻起来好像我继父车上的味道

translation.en: [man] So, uh, how did it go with your in-laws?
translation.zh: 对了 你和岳父母相处得怎么样啊？

translation.en: Was it regular bad, or like really, really terrible?
translation.zh: 一般的糟糕还是一塌糊涂？

translation.en: It was incredible.
translation.zh: 非常好

translation.en: I've never met anyone like these people before.
translation.zh: 我从没见过他们这样的人

translation.en: We went skydiving.
translation.zh: 我们去跳伞

translation.en: We got very drunk.
translation.zh: 喝得酩酊大醉

translation.en: I did a little dancing.
translation.zh: 我还跳了点舞

translation.en: I finally felt like I was part of the cool crowd in high school,
translation.zh: 我终于体验到了炫酷高中生的感觉

translation.en: like I'm a skateboarder, or like I vandalize stuff or something.
translation.zh: 就好像自己是滑板手 或者会搞破坏什么的

translation.en: I don't, but it feels like I could.
translation.zh: 我不干这样的事 但感觉就像我能做出这样的事

translation.en: It was fun. It was almost too much fun.
translation.zh: 很开心 几乎开心得有点过头了

translation.en: Let's just pray to the banking gods that we have a nice, chill day.
translation.zh: 我们向银行之神祈祷今天万事顺利

translation.en: [robber distorted] Everyone, on the ground, now!
translation.zh: 所有人立刻趴在地上！

translation.en: Ground! Let's go! -Move! -[yelling]
translation.zh: 趴在地上！快点！

translation.en: [robber] Go.
translation.zh: 快！

translation.en: You, hurry up.
translation.zh: 你快点

translation.en: Get down! Get down!
translation.zh: 趴下！

translation.en: [robber] Two minutes.
translation.zh: 两分钟

translation.en: [sputtering] Look, listen, listen. I am fully cooperating in every way.
translation.zh: 听我说 我完全配合你们

translation.en: And in that spirit, I have to let you know
translation.zh: 因此我必须告诉你们

translation.en: that this is a state-of-the-art, completely impenetrable security system.
translation.zh: 这保安系统非常先进 不可能突破

translation.en: And there is no way you can pass there in under two--
translation.zh: 你们不可能在两分钟内进入…

translation.en: [sputtering] That was an extremely lucky guess.
translation.zh: 这运气也太好了

translation.en: So you know about the fingerprint bypass?
translation.zh: 你还知道可以指纹免密？

translation.en: However, this is where our journey ends, because there's--
translation.zh: 无论如何 到这里也就结束了 因为…

translation.en: [robber] Shut up! Read.
translation.zh: 闭嘴 读

translation.en: How did you--
translation.zh: 你怎么…

translation.en: [robber] Read!
translation.zh: 读！

translation.en: "She left me roses by the stairs."
translation.zh: 她在楼梯旁给我留了玫瑰

translation.en: [robber] Don't fuck with me. Do not fuck with me!
translation.zh: 别给我耍花招！

translation.en: ♪ She left me roses by the stairs ♪
translation.zh: 她在楼梯旁留了玫瑰给我

translation.en: [robber 1] "Surprises let me know she cares."
translation.zh: “意外之余 我知道了她心有我”

translation.en: [robber 2] Thirty seconds.
-Thanks for letting me out. -[robber] You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢放我出来 -不客气

translation.en: In there.
translation.zh: 进去

translation.en: -[Owen] Okay! Okay! -Fill that up.
translation.zh: -好！ -装满

translation.en: Did you want any small bills in case you have to tip or anything?
translation.zh: 要不要放点小面额的给小费用？

translation.en: [robber] Shut the fuck up!
translation.zh: 你他妈闭嘴

translation.en: Sandalwood? And danger.
translation.zh: 檀香？ 还有危险

translation.en: [robber] Faster, move!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Stop smiling at me.
translation.zh: 别朝我笑

translation.en: Enough.
translation.zh: 够了！

translation.en: Time.
translation.zh: 时间

translation.en: Hey. Hey, look, you know, it's not too late to do the right thing.
translation.zh: 哎 听我说 现在收手还来得及

translation.en: [Owen] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: [robber] Thank you for your cooperation, everyone. Especially you, Owen.
translation.zh: 谢谢各位的合作 尤其是你 欧文

translation.en: You!
translation.zh: 你！

translation.en: [man] They had on top-notch body armor, they had on face mask.
translation.zh: 他们有最好的身体护甲 戴着面罩

translation.en: Stuff I've never seen before, and I know about a lot of good stuff.
translation.zh: 那些东西我见都没见过 好东西我见过很多

translation.en: The type of training I did… [laughs] I know when I see bad guys walking in.
translation.zh: 我接受了很多培训 看到坏人进来 我立刻就发现了

translation.en: So I tried to stop 'em myself, but, um… [clears throat] I slipped.
translation.zh: 于是我上前阻止 但是滑倒了

translation.en: Could we not write that down?
translation.zh: 这个能不能别记？

translation.en: [Marisol faintly] I ain't see shit, I don't know shit, I don't talk to cops.
translation.zh: 我什么都没看到 什么都不知道 我不和警察多说

translation.en: [Gary faintly] …a million times, I can't find the latch.
translation.zh: 已经无数次了 我找不到逃生开关

translation.en: You deal with the security?
translation.zh: 你管保安工作？

translation.en: [exclaims] I'm the boss!
translation.zh: 我是老大！

translation.en: It's the best job in the world.
translation.zh: 这是全世界最好的工作

translation.en: You're adorable.
translation.zh: 你好可爱

translation.en: The first part is a numerical code and it's my childhood phone number.
translation.zh: 第一部分是数字密码 是我小时候的电话号码

translation.en: -[Lilly] Good one. Of course. -It's 402-896-6860. It's easy.
♪ By the stairs ♪
translation.zh: …留了玫瑰给我

translation.en: You gotta get a little nasally, act like you're British, but you're not.
translation.zh: 要有点鼻音 好像自己是英国人 但其实又不是

translation.en: They're from San Diego.
translation.zh: 他们是圣地亚哥人

translation.en: Owen? Oh, my God! But--
translation.zh: 欧文 天呐！怎么弄成这样？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？

translation.en: [exclaims] We came as soon as we heard. -"We"? -[mysterious music playing]
translation.zh: -我们听说之后马上就赶来了 -“我们”？

translation.en: [Oldham] I'm Special Agent Roger Oldham, FBI.
translation.zh: 我是联邦调查局的罗杰·奥德姆探员

translation.en: So what can you tell me about the folks that robbed your bank?
translation.zh: 说说劫匪的情况吧

translation.en: Can you describe them for me physically? Anything?
translation.zh: 能不能描述一下他们的身体特征？ 任何信息都可以

translation.en: [grunts] No, no, can't. They were wearing masks.
translation.zh: 没办法描述 他们当时戴着面具

translation.en: Does the name "The Ghost Bandits" mean anything to you?
translation.zh: 有没有听说过“幽灵强盗”？

translation.en: Yeah, I'm a bank manager.
translation.zh: 嗯 我是一名银行经理

translation.en: They're the most notorious bank robbers in American history.
translation.zh: 幽灵强盗 是美国历史上最臭名昭著的银行劫匪

translation.en: They robbed over a hundred banks.
translation.zh: 抢了超过100间银行

translation.en: They move from state to state,
translation.zh: 在各州流窜作案

translation.en: sometimes they disappear for years at a time.
translation.zh: 有时候会一下子消失好几年

translation.en: -Do you think-- -[mysterious music playing] Do you think it was… the Ghost Bandits that robbed this bank?
translation.zh: 你觉得是幽灵强盗干的？

translation.en: Everything in my gut tells me it's them.
translation.zh: 我感觉就是他们干的

translation.en: Except one thing has been bugging me.
translation.zh: 但是有一件事我一直很疑惑

translation.en: How they gained access to your vault.
translation.zh: 他们是怎么进入你们金库的

translation.en: -[sobbing incoherently] -[Billy] It's all right, Owen. It's okay.
translation.zh: 没事 欧文

translation.en: -[babbling] -[Billy] Breathe, breathe.
translation.zh: -结束了 -深呼吸

translation.en: -There you go, in through your nose. -[Lilly] Blow it out.
translation.zh: 对 用鼻子吸气 -对 -擤出来

translation.en: -Give it a big blow. Good boy. -[Billy] Blow, blow, blow.
translation.zh: -擤出来 -用力擤出来 乖孩子

translation.en: -[blowing violently] -Jesus.
translation.zh: -擤出来 -用力擤出来 乖孩子 哎！

translation.en: Okay, you know what? We're done here, all right? That's enough.
translation.zh: 好的 到此为止 够了

translation.en: -You've probably had enough. -Very emotional.
translation.zh: -你今天已经受够了 -太激动了

translation.en: Well done, Owen.
translation.zh: 非常好 欧文

translation.en: In case anything jogs your memory… the top number, 24/7.
translation.zh: 如果想到什么 随时打上面的号码找我

translation.en: The bottom number… don't call that one.
translation.zh: 下面的那个号码不要打

translation.en: Do we think we might be a little more comfortable if someone was in the front seat?
translation.zh: 如果坐一个人到前排 会不会舒服一点？

translation.en: Nope.
translation.zh: 不会

translation.en: -[Owen] Mmm. -We're here for you.
translation.zh: 有我们照顾你

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: [Billy] Come on.
translation.zh: 来吧

translation.en: Bingo.
translation.zh: 好了！

translation.en: Whose car is this?
translation.zh: 这是谁的车？

translation.en: It's yours, Owen. It's all yours.
translation.zh: 你的 欧文 归你了

translation.en: Isn't that nice? My parents got us a car without asking us first.
translation.zh: 真不错 是吧？ 爸妈问都没问我们 就给我们买了一辆车

translation.en: It's just a little wedding present.
translation.zh: 结婚小礼物嘛

translation.en: We thought you deserved something better than that, uh, wussy wagon of yours.
translation.zh: 你那辆烂车实在有点寒颤

translation.en: So this is what you were doing all day? You were buying a hot rod?
translation.zh: 你们这一整天就是去干这个了啊？ 去买肌肉车了？

translation.en: There's something about it that just screams Owen T. Browning.
translation.zh: 感觉这辆车 特别有欧文·布朗宁的感觉

translation.en: -Don't you agree? -Yeah! It's got your name all over it!
translation.zh: -不是吗？ -是啊 特别适合你

translation.en: -I love it! Oh, yeah! -[Lilly laughing]
translation.zh: 我很喜欢 太好了！

translation.en: I love it, thank you. Um, I can't wait to drive it.
translation.zh: 我太喜欢了 谢谢你们 我真是迫不及待了

translation.en: -Want to take it for a spin now? -No.
translation.zh: 现在就开一圈？ 不了

translation.en: I'm like 85% certain it's them. I have to tell Parker.
translation.zh: 我85%确定是他们 我得告诉帕克尔

translation.en: If you falsely accuse your fiancée's parents of robbing a bank,
translation.zh: 如果你错怪未婚妻父母抢银行

translation.en: that is relationship suicide!
translation.zh: 这桩婚事就完了！

translation.en: So what am I supposed to do, hmm? Pretend like it didn't happen?
translation.zh: 那我怎么办？假装没这回事？

translation.en: Hell, yes! Let me tell you something, I spent 80% of my life acting like shit didn't happen.
translation.zh: 没错 我跟你说 我这辈子80%时间都在假装没事

translation.en: Three weeks ago, I spilled some Lucky Charms in my bed,
translation.zh: 三周前 我把麦片弄洒在自己床上

translation.en: I still ain't said shit about it.
translation.zh: 我到现在都没说什么

translation.en: [laughs] And, besides, didn't you tell me you gave them the code to the vault?
translation.zh: 还有 你不是说 你把金库密码告诉了他们吗？

translation.en: Well, yeah, but I was wasted and I was trying to impress them.
translation.zh: 对 当时我喝醉了跟他们吹牛

translation.en: Yeah, that means if they robbed the bank,
translation.zh: 嗯 也就是说 如果他们抢劫了银行

translation.en: you did too.
translation.zh: 那你也有份

translation.en: -[laughing] -No, I didn't.
translation.zh: 哪儿有？

translation.en: -You gave them the fuckin' code! -[softly] Are you saying I'm an accessory?
translation.zh: -你把密码都他妈给他们了！ -你是说我是从犯？

translation.en: No, you ain't no accessory, you are the fucking mastermind!
translation.zh: 不是从犯 你是他妈主谋！

translation.en: [laughing] This is gangster! Okay, look, can I be honest with you?
translation.zh: 最大滔天！ 我跟你说实话

translation.en: I steal, too, from the bank. That's right.
translation.zh: 我也偷银行的东西

translation.en: I haven't bought toilet paper in seven years.
translation.zh: 没错 我7年没买过厕纸了

translation.en: -That was you? -Mmm-hmm!
translation.zh: -是你拿的？ -嗯

translation.en: From the men's and the ladies' bathroom. Come on, that's execution.
translation.zh: 包括男厕和女厕 拜托 执行力可强了

translation.en: I don't care about the toilet paper. I don't care about the toilet paper.
translation.zh: 厕纸的事我不管

translation.en: -Hey! Okay, goodbye, thank you. -Hey! Who was that?
translation.zh: -哎！好的 再见 谢谢 -哎！是谁啊？

translation.en: The baker. They just called.
translation.zh: 面包房 他们打过来说店里乱得一塌糊涂 蛋糕做不了了

translation.en: They said there was a big commotion over there and they can't make the cake.
translation.zh: 他们打过来说店里乱得一塌糊涂 蛋糕做不了了

translation.en: Wait, what? You're serious?
translation.zh: 等等 什么？你说真的？

translation.en: -I know! -What happened?
translation.zh: -是啊 -怎么了？

translation.en: -The baker died. -[gasps] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -面包师死了 -天呐！

translation.en: -How? -Kicked in the chest by a horse.
translation.zh: -怎么死的？ -被马踢中胸部

translation.en: -Jesus! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -神啊！ -嗯

translation.en: Heart exploded on impact.
translation.zh: 把心脏踢爆了

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -I know.
translation.zh: -天呐！ -是啊

translation.en: -Hey, don't be sad! Hey, don't be sad! -[exclaims]
translation.zh: 哎 别伤心！

translation.en: It's okay, 'cause the… the baker was racist.
translation.zh: 没事 那个面包师是种族主义者

translation.en: -Yeah, like, a bad racist. -Are there good racists?
translation.zh: -很坏的种族主义者 -种族主义者有好的吗？

translation.en: Well, my grandmother, so… Anyway, what's up?
translation.zh: 我奶奶就是 对了 什么事？

translation.en: Uh, my parents made samosas, so I was just coming to tell you.
translation.zh: 我爸妈做了咖喱饺 我来跟你说一下

translation.en: How light and fun! Samosas! I love that.
translation.zh: 好棒啊！咖喱饺！我很喜欢吃！

translation.en: -Okay, I'll see you down there. -Just take your time.
translation.zh: -我一会儿就下去 -不急

translation.en: -All right? -It'll be okay.
translation.zh: -好吗？ -没事的

translation.en: -It's all right, we'll get a new cake. -All right. Yeah.
translation.zh: -没事 我们重新订一个蛋糕 -嗯

translation.en: Definitely not a racist this time. [laughing] All right, love you.
translation.zh: 这次肯定不能是种族主义者了 好的 爱你噢

translation.en: Hi. I'm going to need to cancel a cake order.
translation.zh: 你好 我要取消一个蛋糕订单

translation.en: Yeah, my fiancée was kicked in the head by a horse.
translation.zh: 嗯 我未婚妻脑袋被马踢了

translation.en: Why are you so nervous, Owen?
translation.zh: 你为什么这么紧张 欧文？

translation.en: So, I know this might sound crazy,
translation.zh: 我知道这听起来很离谱

translation.en: but I think Parker's parents
translation.zh: 但是我觉得帕克尔的父母

translation.en: might be criminals.
translation.zh: 可能是罪犯

translation.en: -Yeah! -Well, of course they're criminals.
translation.zh: -嗯 -当然是罪犯

translation.en: Why do you think they're skipping their daughter's wedding?
translation.zh: 要不怎么会连女儿的婚礼都不来？

translation.en: They're coming to the fucking wedding! Okay?
translation.zh: 他们来参加婚礼！好吗？

translation.en: [sputtering] They're literally coming! We're--
translation.zh: 真的来！我们…

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: I think that they are the people that robbed my bank.
translation.zh: 我觉得抢我银行的就是他们

translation.en: -No! How do you know? -I don't.
translation.zh: -不是吧！你怎么知道？ -我不知道啊

translation.en: But I'm not gonna turn Parker's life upside down unless I do know for a fact,
translation.zh: 这对帕克尔的影响太大 一定要确定了才能说

translation.en: so I need your help, okay?
translation.zh: 所以我需要你们帮忙

translation.en: Okay, okay, here they come. Do that thing you guys do.
translation.zh: 他们来了 把你们的拿手好戏施展出来

translation.en: What thing?
translation.zh: 什么拿手好戏？

translation.en: That thing where you ask highly-invasive, inappropriate personal questions.
translation.zh: 刨根问底问八卦私人问题

translation.en: Hmm? Okay, come on!
translation.zh: 好的 拜托

translation.en: [loudly] Hi, guys! Hey!
translation.zh: 你们好啊！

translation.en: Honey. You sure you're up for this?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你真的准备好了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, you? -Oh, yeah. I took a weed gummy.
translation.zh: -嗯 你呢？ -嗯 我吃了颗大麻软糖

translation.en: Smart! Billy and Lilly McDermott, meet my parents Neil and Margie Browning.
translation.zh: 聪明 比利和莉利·麦克德莫特 这是我爸妈尼尔和玛吉·布朗宁

translation.en: -Pleasure to me you, Neil. -It's my pleasure.
translation.zh: -幸会 尼尔 -幸会

translation.en: -You're very attractive. -Oh, thank you.
translation.zh: -你很有魅力 -谢谢

translation.en: That's not a compliment. For me, it's too much.
translation.zh: 这不是夸奖 我觉得有点过头

translation.en: [Lilly] Well, hi, there.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Hi, hello. -[Margie] Hi.
translation.zh: -你好 -你好

translation.en: [Lilly] Mmm! Oh, wow! Speaking of attractive, you have absolutely flawless skin.
translation.zh: 说到魅力 你的皮肤真是完美无瑕

translation.en: What do you use?
translation.zh: 你用什么的啊？

translation.en: Soap.
translation.zh: 肥皂

translation.en: -Perhaps we should have some cocktails? -[Lilly] Yeah, cocktails.
translation.zh: -要不我们喝点鸡尾酒？ -好的 喝鸡尾酒

translation.en: The sun is still out.
translation.zh: 太阳还没下山呢

translation.en: [laughs nervously] Okay, we got a table. Let's sit down.
translation.zh: 好的 我们订了桌子 坐下吧

translation.en: It's gonna be fun!
translation.zh: 会很开心的！

translation.en: -[McDermotts laughing] -And then I said, "We don't need a gondolier!"
translation.zh: 然后我说：“我们不需要船夫！“

translation.en: Lilly, she pushes the wee fella off the boat, and we start paddling up the Grand Canal.
translation.zh: 莉利把那小伙儿推下船 然后我们就划着船在大运河里前行

translation.en: So, Billy, Lilly, let me ask you something.
translation.zh: 对了 比利 莉利 问你们一件事

translation.en: [Billy] Yeah, shoot.
translation.zh: 嗯 问吧

translation.en: -Have you ever committed a felony? -[Owen gags] Mmm-mmm.
translation.zh: 你们有没有犯过重罪？

translation.en: [Margie] No, no, no!
translation.zh: -不是的 如果要成为一家人… -别这样

translation.en: Now, if we're gonna be family, we need to know if they're criminals, so…
translation.zh: -不是的 如果要成为一家人… -别这样 …就得知道他们是不是罪犯 所以…

translation.en: -[Owen] Stop. Don't. -Give me that. Are you criminals?
translation.zh: -别这样 -过来 你们是罪犯吗？

translation.en: My parents aren't criminals.
translation.zh: 我父母不是罪犯

translation.en: No, that's okay, baby.
translation.zh: 没事 宝贝

translation.en: I'm sure our lifestyle seems a little, um, unconventional to the Brownings.
translation.zh: 我们的生活方式 在布朗宁一家人看来 似乎确实与众不同

translation.en: Well, yeah, I mean they live in the jungle with the edamame people.
translation.zh: 嗯 他们与糯米人一起在丛林生活

translation.en: [Owen] No, that's a bean.
translation.zh: 不是糯米族

translation.en: -[Neil] What's the name? -Yanomami.
translation.zh: -叫什么来着？ -亚诺马米

translation.en: What'd I say?
translation.zh: 我说的是什么？

translation.en: You said edamame, like at a Japanese restaurant.
translation.zh: 你说的是“糯米” 日本餐厅里很多

translation.en: They are the people of waitheri, totihi, peheti.
translation.zh: 亚诺马米人waitheri totihi peheti

translation.en: What is that now?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: It's a common Yanomami phrase. I'm sure you've heard it.
translation.zh: 这是亚诺马米人常说的话 你们一定听过

translation.en: -Honey, what are you doing? -Nothing! Just striking up a convo.

translation.zh: …穿的这件衬衫好软 感觉好像我的手指在做水疗

translation.en: -Really? Looks pretty starchy-- -Don't touch me!
translation.zh: -看起来也不怎么样嘛… -别碰我！

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just…
translation.zh: 不好意思 因为岳父母在婚礼前不可以碰新郎

translation.en: the in-laws aren't supposed to touch the groom before the wedding.
translation.zh: 因为岳父母在婚礼前不可以碰新郎

translation.en: -That's horseshit. -Are you high right now, Owen?
translation.zh: -胡说八道 -你是不是吸毒了 欧文？

translation.en: I don't do illegal things, unlike other people.
translation.zh: 我不做违法的事 和别人不一样

translation.en: Other people do… illegal things, and I'm cool with that too.
translation.zh: 别人会做违法的事 我也不介意

translation.en: And if we want to talk about that and just sort of get things off our chest…
translation.zh: 如果要谈这个问题 说说心里话 我也没意见

translation.en: Okay, uh, we gotta go, 'cause we gotta be at the bakery.
translation.zh: 好的 我们得走了 因为我们得去面包房

translation.en: The bakery! Yep! Okay, I think me and you should just go to the bakery,
translation.zh: 面包房 对 好的 咱们俩去面包房吧

translation.en: just because our baker died, we gotta get a new cake.
translation.zh: 因为我们的面包师去世了 我们得新做一个蛋糕

translation.en: Perhaps we should all just go together. One big happy family.
translation.zh: 要不我们还是一起去吧 欢乐的大家庭

translation.en: You guys don't wanna run errands.
translation.zh: 还是不要让你们为这些小事跑了

translation.en: I do.
translation.zh: 我想去

translation.en: Of course we do. Who doesn't like desserts?
translation.zh: 我们当然想去 谁不喜欢甜点呢？

translation.en: Well, they're vegan desserts, and we all know that they taste like shit.
translation.zh: 是全素甜点 大家都知道很难吃

translation.en: I'm sorry, Parker, but I'm being honest with you.
translation.zh: 不好意思 帕克尔 不过我和你说实话

translation.en: They taste like shit, okay?
translation.zh: 确实很难吃 好吗？

translation.en: So you guys should stay, we should go eat the shit. Come on.
translation.zh: 所以你们还是别去了 我们去尝 走吧

translation.en: [Parker on mic] As long as we leave now.
translation.zh: 如果我们现在出发的话

translation.en: [Owen] Oh, we're all going. Cool, good. All right! Okay!
translation.zh: -我们要迟到了 -我们都去？好吧 好的！

translation.en: [singsong] Okay! Oh, we're tasting cakes at 1308 Grant Avenue!
translation.zh: 好的！ 我们去格兰特大道1308号品尝蛋糕！

translation.en: You know, when I go on a trip, I usually take two bags. I have a carry-on, then I check one too.
translation.zh: 我出门都会带两个包 手提一个 然后检查一下 一 二

translation.en: -[on mic] I check one, two. -Schmuck.
translation.zh: 然后检查一下 一 二 笨蛋

translation.en: [Owen] You're driving! Billy McDermott is driving! Cool.
translation.zh: 你开车！ 比利·麦克德莫特开车！真好

translation.en: Hey, do you want to play Never Have I Ever?
translation.zh: 要玩“我从来没有”游戏吗？

translation.en: Never have I ever worn a scary mask when it wasn't Halloween.
translation.zh: 我从来没有戴过恐怖面具 万圣节除外

translation.en: Now your turn.
translation.zh: 轮到你了

translation.en: [Owen] We have arrived. I am one click south of the door.
translation.zh: 我们到了 就在店门南面

translation.en: You guys sure you don't wanna wait in the car? No? Okay.
translation.zh: 你们真的不要在车里等？好的

translation.en: We are zero clicks from the door. -I am opening the door. -[bell ringing]
translation.zh: 我们到了门前 我现在打开门

translation.en: -[Owen] Right this way, come on in. -[Billy] Go ahead. Smells good.
translation.zh: -这边 请进 -好香啊 -好香 -真不错

translation.en: Nice. Yep, that's cake.
translation.zh: -好香 -真不错 嗯 看见蛋糕了

translation.en: Welcome to Vegan Divas. Where you can get your cake--
translation.zh: 欢迎光临“全素天后” 这里为您制作蛋糕…

translation.en: -[door opens loudly] -And eat it too! I'm Kay.
translation.zh: 悉听尊便！ 我是凯伊 这是我姐姐艾达

translation.en: And this is my sister Ida.
translation.zh: 我是凯伊 这是我姐姐艾达

translation.en: She's the vegan and I'm the diva.
translation.zh: 她负责全素 我负责天后

translation.en: Thank you so much for fitting us in last minute.
translation.zh: 非常感谢你们 在最后一刻帮我们准备蛋糕

translation.en: -Yep. -Don't even worry about it.
translation.zh: 没事 我很理解最后一刻这件事

translation.en: I totally get last minute. I'm never on time for anything.
translation.zh: 没事 我很理解最后一刻这件事 我做什么事都不准时

translation.en: Are you sure about this? [laughs]
translation.zh: 你确定要在这里做吗？

translation.en: [whispers] Our wedding is at a very specific time.
translation.zh: 我们的婚礼可延误不得

translation.en: No, it's okay. The reviews were great.
translation.zh: 不 没事 他们的评论很好

translation.en: -This is just their shtick. -[head bangs]
translation.zh: 这只是他们的营销方式

translation.en: [Kay on mic] Why do I keep doing that? [Ida] Hey, I think you might be bleeding.
translation.zh: -我怎么老是这样 艾达？ -凯伊 你可能在流血

translation.en: -[Kay] Ida! -[Ida] Okay, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: -艾达！ -好吧 对不起

translation.en: -[Kay] Cake! Hurry! -[Ida] Okay.
translation.zh: -蛋糕！快点！ -好吧

translation.en: So this is our Better-Than-Sex red velvet cake
translation.zh: 这是我们的“超越性爱”红丝绒蛋糕

translation.en: that Ida makes from scratch.
translation.zh: 艾达亲手做的

translation.en: And that name is no lie.
translation.zh: 这名字可不是骗人的

translation.en: I've compared them both.
translation.zh: 我把两样对比过

translation.en: Mmm! And this is vegan?
translation.zh: 这是全素的？

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: [softly] Parker, can I speak with you in private real quick?
translation.zh: 帕克尔 能和你私下说两句吗？很快

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么了？

translation.en: -I like to concur… -What? Sure. …about, you know, important life decisions before we make them.
translation.zh: -啊？好的 -重要的人生决定 我们要商量一致

translation.en: -You know? Mmm-hmm. -Really?
translation.zh: -好吧？ -是嘛？

translation.en: -You have a little something here. -What's that, sweetheart?
translation.zh: -你这里有点东西 -什么 亲爱的？

translation.en: What the fuck?
translation.zh: 搞什么鬼？

translation.en: I'm sorry! I didn't know you guys were together!
translation.zh: 对不起！我不知道你们是一对

translation.en: [laughs] Owen, what's going on?
translation.zh: 欧文 怎么了？

translation.en: Okay, I know this is gonna sound crazy, but the FBI thinks
translation.zh: 我知道说出来你会觉得很离谱 联邦调查局认为我和劫案有关

translation.en: -I had something to do with the robbery. -What?
translation.zh: 联邦调查局认为我和劫案有关

translation.en: -They made me wear-- -[doors open]
translation.zh: -啊？ -他们让我戴…

translation.en: Oh! What a lovely little bakery.
translation.zh: 噢！好漂亮的小面包房

translation.en: -You must be Parker! -Hi.
translation.zh: -你一定是帕克尔！ -你好

translation.en: -[Parker yelps] -[all clamoring]
translation.zh: -你来这里干什么？ -谁都不要乱来！

translation.en: -[loudly] Ah! Nobody make a scene! -You're the one with the gun, Rehan.
translation.zh: -你来这里干什么？ -谁都不要乱来！ 拿着枪的人是你 瑞涵

translation.en: Yes, you are the one with the gun holding hostages right now…
translation.zh: 对 现在是你拿着枪 在面包房里劫持多名人质

translation.en: -[on mic] …inside of the bakery. -[gags] Oh, hostages!
translation.zh: 在面包房里劫持多名人质 人质！

translation.en: -What the hell is going on? -Listen, Rehan.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -听我说 瑞涵 我们说了会弄钱给你

translation.en: -We told you we'd get you the money. -Oh, yes. No, you did.
translation.zh: -怎么回事？ -听我说 瑞涵 我们说了会弄钱给你 噢 对 没错 但我记得你们说话不算数

translation.en: But then I remembered you are liars.
translation.zh: 噢 对 没错 但我记得你们说话不算数

translation.en: Just in case you were planning on slithering away into the shadows again,
translation.zh: 为了防止你们又逃之夭夭

translation.en: I thought I'd come here for a little… -insurance. -[Parker yelps]
translation.zh: 我想着来这里拿点保障

translation.en: -[Rehan] Come along, Parker. -Hey, hey, hey! Just take me instead.
translation.zh: -走吧 帕克尔 -哎！拿我换她

translation.en: Take me!
translation.zh: 带我走！

translation.en: You little Build-A-Bear? You think you're hostage material?
translation.zh: 你这熊熊工作室小子？ 你觉得你有资格当人质吗？

translation.en: No one here gives two shits whether you live or die!
translation.zh: 没人在意你的死活

translation.en: Look at them and check in with them.
translation.zh: 看看他们 了解一下情况

translation.en: Oh! Zero shits given.
translation.zh: 完全不在意

translation.en: I don't understand. Was Owen right?
translation.zh: 我搞不懂 欧文猜对了？

translation.en: Just do what she says.
translation.zh: 按她说的做

translation.en: Stay calm, baby. Just stay calm.
translation.zh: 冷静 宝贝 冷静一点

translation.en: So emo! Getting choked up.
translation.zh: 情绪都起来了 哭得快喘不过气来了

translation.en: -Dad? Dad? -I like getting choked, though.
translation.zh: -爸？ -不过我就喜欢喘不过气来

translation.en: You can eat my cake anytime!
translation.zh: 随时欢迎你来吃我的圆面包！

translation.en: Please, God, save my fiancée who is exiting the back of the bakery right now.
translation.zh: 神啊 救救我的未婚妻吧 她正从面包店后门走出

translation.en: FBI! Freeze!
translation.zh: 联邦调查局！不许动！

translation.en: God'll save you, Parker!
translation.zh: 神会拯救你 帕克尔！

translation.en: [whining loudly] Please! God, please! Please! Please, God!
translation.zh: 神啊 求你了！

translation.en: Ahh! Oh! Oh, shit!
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: Come on, Roger! You got this, Roger! Be a man, you dickhead!
translation.zh: 振作起来 罗杰！你行的 罗杰！ 要有男子汉的样子 混蛋！

translation.en: -[shrieking continues on mic] -God, man!
translation.zh: 哎呀 真是的！

translation.en: -[Parker] Fuck you! -[Rehan] Go on, take her!
translation.zh: 混蛋！ 抓她上车！上车！

translation.en: Get the fuck in! Get in the car!
translation.zh: 抓她上车！上车！

translation.en: I'm going after her.
translation.zh: 我去追她

translation.en: What the fuck? Oh, son of a bitch.
translation.zh: 什么鬼？ 王八蛋！

translation.en: Everything's fucking cake in here!
translation.zh: 这里他妈什么都是蛋糕！

translation.en: I'm going after her!
translation.zh: 我去追她！

translation.en: No! You're gonna get yourself killed! Get down! Get down!
translation.zh: 你会送命的 趴下！

translation.en: You're really fuckin' getting on my tits!
translation.zh: 你真的气死我了！

translation.en: -[music stops] -Shut up!
translation.zh: 闭嘴！

translation.en: Lilly! Lilly, the front!
translation.zh: 莉利！莉利 前门！

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 走！

translation.en: Go for the tires.
translation.zh: 对准车打！

translation.en: [Rehan] Get me my fucking money!
translation.zh: 给我她妈弄钱！

translation.en: Ah, shit.
translation.zh: 妈的！

translation.en: I fucking love this job!
translation.zh: 我他妈太爱这活儿了！

translation.en: -[loud bang] -[Rehan] Motherfuckers!
translation.zh: 王八蛋！

translation.en: [Oldham] Freeze!
translation.zh: 不许动！

translation.en: [Billy] What?
translation.zh: 啊？

translation.en: Put your guns down.
translation.zh: 把枪放下

translation.en: Put 'em down now.
translation.zh: 立刻放下

translation.en: -They got our daughter. -Don't move!
translation.zh: -他们抓了我们的女儿 -别动

translation.en: -[Billy] Motherfucker! -[groaning]
translation.zh: 王八蛋！

translation.en: You! You were supposed to protect her!
translation.zh: 你 你应该保护她的！

translation.en: This is why people don't trust the federal government.
translation.zh: 所以大家才不信任联邦政府！

translation.en: This is on you! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 这件事你要负责任

translation.en: Let me in! Hey, let me in!
translation.zh: 让我上车 哎

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no!
translation.zh: 别走啊！

translation.en: Let me in! Let me in!
translation.zh: 让我上车 好吗？

translation.en: -Okay, I committed. [grunting] -[engine revving]
translation.zh: 我豁出去了

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: -[Billy] Oh, Jesus. -[Owen] Ow!
translation.zh: 天呐！

translation.en: [Billy] Come on, get your ass out here. There you go.
translation.zh: 来 下车 好

translation.en: Ahh! Why are we stopped? We gotta go after her!
translation.zh: 为什么停车？我们得去追她！

translation.en: -I know where that woman lives! -Rehan has houses everywhere.
translation.zh: 我知道那女人住在哪里 瑞涵到处都有房子 根本不知道她把帕克尔带去了哪里

translation.en: We have no idea where she took Parker.
translation.zh: 瑞涵到处都有房子 根本不知道她把帕克尔带去了哪里

translation.en: [Billy] Even if you did, what were you gonna do?
translation.zh: 即便你知道 你又能怎么样？

translation.en: Sneak into the bushes and get chased up a tree by a pack of tiny dogs?
translation.zh: 偷偷钻进灌木丛 然后被一群小狗追上树？

translation.en: Parker is in the wind.
translation.zh: 帕克尔已经不见了

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Well, what are we gonna do now?
translation.zh: -对不起 -现在我们怎么办？

translation.en: The first thing we're gonna do is you're gonna take that fucking wire off.
translation.zh: 第一件事就是你把他妈密录器拆掉

translation.en: [Billy] You little shit bag.
translation.zh: 你这小王八蛋

translation.en: I knew you were a coward but I didn't take you to be a rat.
translation.zh: 我早就知道你没胆子 但没想到你居然会当内奸

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, but I'm not gonna take the fall for you guys!
translation.zh: 对不起 但你们别把责任推到我身上

translation.en: We never asked you to.
translation.zh: 我们从没让你承担责任

translation.en: No! You just framed me!
translation.zh: 没错！你们只是嫁祸给我罢了

translation.en: You put bank-robbing evidence in the trunk of my car!
translation.zh: 你们把抢银行的证据 放在我车的后备箱里！

translation.en: He wouldn't have been convicted of anything!
translation.zh: 他不可能被判有罪

translation.en: It was just enough to tie him up
translation.zh: 最多就是让他忙活一阵

translation.en: and save Parker from making the biggest mistake of her life.
translation.zh: 免得帕克尔犯下人生中最大的错误

translation.en: [yelling] She just got kidnapped because of you!
translation.zh: 她刚被绑架 就因为你们！

translation.en: Before you came back in her life, the worst thing that happened to Parker?
translation.zh: 在你们回来之前 帕克尔遇到最麻烦的事是什么？

translation.en: She burned the roof of her mouth on a home-made flatbread.
translation.zh: 被自制煎饼烫伤上颚

translation.en: I would've blown on it, but I couldn't. I had a cold.
translation.zh: 我原本可以把饼吹凉 但没办法 我当时感冒了

translation.en: How could you guys possibly know what she wants?
translation.zh: 你们怎么可能知道 她想要什么、需要什么？

translation.en: Or needs? You weren't there!
translation.zh: 你们怎么可能知道 她想要什么、需要什么？ 你们根本不在！

translation.en: Because we were trying to fucking protect her, that's why!
translation.zh: 因为我们他妈是为了保护她！

translation.en: Rehan used to be our partner.
translation.zh: 瑞涵以前是我们的拍档

translation.en: She would choose the bank and clean the money.
translation.zh: 她负责挑选银行和洗钱

translation.en: And then she started to fuckin' lose it!
translation.zh: 然后她就开始发疯

translation.en: We were afraid she would find out about Parker.
translation.zh: 我们当时害怕她会知道帕克尔

translation.en: So on the last job, we just took the money and ran.
translation.zh: 所以在干最后一票的时候 我们就拿钱跑了

translation.en: I don't give a shit. I don't care what happened, okay?
translation.zh: 不关我的事 我不关心发生了什么 好吗？

translation.en: -I just care about getting Parker back. -Oh, yeah, you and me both.
translation.zh: 我只关心怎么把帕克尔救回来 嗯 彼此彼此

translation.en: You need five million in two days. So you're gonna rob another bank, right?
translation.zh: 你们需要在两天内筹到500万 所以要再抢一间银行 对吧？

translation.en: Wouldn't hurt to have a bank manager on the team.
translation.zh: 有一位银行经理加入团队不会有坏处

translation.en: Someone who knows the bank's weaknesses, which ones have excess cash holdings,
translation.zh: 知道银行的弱点 哪些银行有超量现金

translation.en: when and where they move that cash.
translation.zh: 什么时候把现金运去哪里

translation.en: He gets nervous cracking an egg. You think he can rob a bank?
translation.zh: 他敲鸡蛋都紧张 你觉得他能抢银行？

translation.en: If it's to save Parker? Fuck yeah, I'll rob a bank!
translation.zh: 为了救帕克尔 抢银行就抢银行！

translation.en: We always knew they were criminals.
translation.zh: 我们早就知道他们是罪犯

translation.en: [whispers] They drink during the day.
translation.zh: 他们大白天就喝酒

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah. Hey, and the daughter… is a yoga instructor.
translation.zh: 嗯 而且女儿是瑜伽教练

translation.en: I'm not saying anything, but, you know, connect the dots.
translation.zh: 也不是我说什么 但是要把这些连在一起看

translation.en: Do you have any idea where they might've gone?
translation.zh: 知道他们可能去哪里了吗？

translation.en: Does Owen have any access to a family cabin or anything like that?
translation.zh: 家里有没有小屋什么的？ 欧文会不会去那里？

translation.en: A, um, a vacation home--
translation.zh: 度假屋…

translation.en: Vacation home? What, are you kidding me?
translation.zh: 度假屋？你开什么玩笑？

translation.en: Who do we look like, The Jeffersons?
translation.zh: 我们像“杰佛逊一家”那种有钱人吗？

translation.en: Here's a list of all the banks within a 100-mile radius,
translation.zh: 这是160公里半径内所有银行的清单

translation.en: arranged by on-site cash holdings, from ValueBank all the way up to--
translation.zh: 按行内现金存量排序 从价值银行到现金最多的…

translation.en: Atlas Reserve, 20 million dollars.
translation.zh: 阿特拉斯储备银行 2000万美元

translation.en: -One-stop shopping. -Hmm! Easy.
translation.zh: 一站买齐 简单

translation.en: [laughing] Yeah, I wish!
translation.zh: 简单倒好了

translation.en: -[Billy] No? -No.
translation.zh: -不简单？ -不简单

translation.en: We can't rob Atlas Reserve.
translation.zh: 我们不能抢阿特拉斯储备银行

translation.en: Phoebe King has that place on lock.
translation.zh: 菲比·金把那里管得很严

translation.en: Who's Phoebe King?
translation.zh: 菲比·金是谁？

translation.en: I thought you guys were the Ghost Bandits. You don't know who Phoebe King is?
translation.zh: 你们不是幽灵强盗吗？ 居然不知道菲比·金？

translation.en: -She pioneered bandit barriers. -[upbeat music playing]
translation.zh: 她对“强盗屏障”进行创新

translation.en: [Owen] Every inch of her bank is triple secured.
translation.zh: 她的银行的每一寸角落都有三层防护

translation.en: I'd fuck me.
translation.zh: 我都想上自己

translation.en: And her vault?
translation.zh: 她的金库呢？

translation.en: I'm talking biometrics, weight sensitivity,
translation.zh: 生物特征识别 重量感应

translation.en: not to mention randomized time locks! [laughing] Okay?
translation.zh: 更不用说随机时间锁了 好吗？

translation.en: When did you make this?
translation.zh: 你什么时候做的这个？

translation.en: When I walked to the vending machine, got a Diet Squirt.
translation.zh: 我朝自动售卖机走过去时 买了一罐低糖汽水

translation.en: Weirdly, I had a lot of it in my pockets.
translation.zh: 很奇怪 我口袋里有很多

translation.en: So, let me get this straight.
translation.zh: 我多问一句

translation.en: You made a model of a bank we're not gonna rob?
translation.zh: 我们不抢这家银行 但你却做了一个模型？

translation.en: Oh, wow. There's another one. He made two.

translation.en: from Moana had a heart attack, so I had to give him CPR.

translation.en: -Okay-- -You listen to me.

translation.en: Pussy.

translation.en: -[whispers] Tyree! Tyree! Shh! -What?

translation.en: Don't tell anybody, but your bank's about to be robbed.

translation.en: What do you mean, don't tell nobody? They about to rob the bank again?

translation.en: -Shh! -[yelling] What the fuck, man?

translation.en: Damn it! Man, I haven't even… I left some shit in the microwave!

translation.en: -Shh! -Fuck! I haven't even taken my lunch yet!

translation.en: No, you don't shush me! -Fuck this! I'm out. -[Oldham] Ugh!

translation.en: -[Tyree yells in distance] Fuck! The fuck… -Why did you say that?

translation.en: -I told you not to say anything. -[Tyree faintly] This job fucking sucks!

translation.en: [softly] Just like Owen told you not to say anything.

translation.en: It's a setup! It's a setup! They're going after a different bank!

translation.en: -[grunts] Get out, I'm taking the car. -Not a chance.

translation.en: It's taken me years to get this seat exactly the way I like.

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 真是的！

translation.en: God damn it!

translation.en: -Where to? -Atlas Reserve! They're desperate.

translation.en: -[thrilling music stops suddenly] -[Oldham] Come on! Come on!
translation.zh: 快点！

translation.en: Little faster, please?

translation.en: And now for the money shot.

translation.en: Synchronized manual locks.

translation.en: Yeah.

translation.en: -It's not the most discreet signal. -[chirping continues]

translation.en: -[chirping continues] -Jesus, Owen, we got it.

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! If this kid makes it out alive, I'm gonna kill him.

translation.en: -[car alarm wailing] -[Billy] Fuckin' hell!

translation.en: Three, two, one, and release.

translation.en: What the fuck is that? Oop!

translation.en: I'm sorry! I'm a coward!

translation.en: Yes! Yes!

translation.en: -[Lilly yells] -[guard groans]

translation.en: I'm coming for you, Parker.

translation.en: Nope! That didn't go as planned.

translation.en: Oh, my God.

translation.en: Oh, my God.

translation.en: -No! No! -[Billy] Come on, sunshine, out you get.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: For everything. This has been… one hell of a week.

translation.en: Of course.

translation.en: -I love you. -I love you.

translation.en: for the first time as a married couple,

translation.en: [Billy] Hold up.

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Everyone's getting pregnant tonight!

translation.en: -["All The Small Things" continues] -[Billy] Game on.
